comment.author: 92598414@N03
comment._content: The gentleman called "H.E" is the Governor of News South Wales, Lord Augustus William Frederick Spencer Loftus. H.E. short for His Excellency. That would date the photograph between the 11th April 1884, when he left Sydney aboard the H.M.S Miranda, and the 30th April 1884 when he arrived back in Sydney. The gentleman with his hands in his pockets would be Montagu Efferton Loftus, his youngest son who I think was acting as his aide-de-camp.
